query.name: findByPK
query.sql: SELECT ss.*,st.unique_identifier FROM study_subject ss, study st WHERE ss.study_subject_id = ? and ss.study_id = st.study_id

query.name: findByPKAndStudy
query.sql: SELECT ss.* FROM study_subject ss, study st WHERE ss.study_subject_id = ? AND ss.study_id=st.study_id AND (st.study_id=? or st.parent_study_id=?)

query.name: findByOidAndStudy
query.sql: SELECT SS.* FROM STUDY_SUBJECT SS, study st WHERE SS.oc_oid = ? AND SS.study_id = st.study_id AND (st.study_id=? or st.parent_study_id=?)

query.name: findByOid
query.sql: SELECT SS.* FROM STUDY_SUBJECT SS WHERE SS.oc_oid = ?

query.name: getCountofStudySubjectsAtStudyOrSite
query.sql: select count(*) from study_subject where study_id = ?

query.name: getCountofStudySubjectsAtStudyOrSite
query.sql: select count(*) from study_subject where study_id = ?

query.name: getCountofStudySubjectsAtStudy
query.sql: select count(*) from study_subject, study s where s.study_id = study_subject.study_id and (s.study_id = ? or s.parent_study_id = ?)

query.name: getCountofStudySubjects
query.sql: select count (*) from (select distinct ss.* from study_subject ss, study s where ss.study_id = s.study_id AND ( s.study_id = ? or s.parent_study_id = ? )) as ss

query.name: getCountofStudySubjectsBasedOnStatus
query.sql: select count (*) from (select DISTINCT(ss.*) from study_subject ss,study s, status where status.status_id = ss.status_id AND ss.study_id = s.study_id AND ( s.study_id = ? or s.parent_study_id = ? ) AND status.status_id = ? ) as ss

query.name: getCountOfActiveStudySubjects
query.sql: select count (*) from study_subject ss WHERE ss.status_id in (1,8)

query.name: getCountWithFilter
query.sql: SELECT COUNT( DISTINCT SS.study_subject_id) FROM study_subject ss LEFT JOIN study_event se ON ss.study_subject_id = se.study_subject_id,STUDY ST,SUBJECT S where SS.SUBJECT_ID=S.SUBJECT_ID AND SS.study_id = ST.study_id AND (ST.study_id=? or ST.parent_study_id=?)

query.name: getWithFilterAndSort
query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT(ss.*), ST.unique_identifier FROM study_subject ss LEFT JOIN study_event se ON ss.study_subject_id = se.study_subject_id,STUDY ST,SUBJECT S where SS.SUBJECT_ID=S.SUBJECT_ID AND SS.study_id = ST.study_id AND (ST.study_id=? or ST.parent_study_id=?)

query.name: getCountWithFilterListDiscNotes
query.sql: SELECT COUNT( DISTINCT SS.study_subject_id) FROM study_subject SS,STUDY ST, study_event SE,dn_item_data_map didm, discrepancy_note dn where SS.study_id = ST.study_id AND ss.study_subject_id = se.study_subject_id AND (ST.study_id=? or ST.parent_study_id= ?) AND didm.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id AND didm.discrepancy_note_id = dn.discrepancy_note_id

query.name: getWithFilterAndSortListDiscNotes
query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT(ss.*) FROM study_subject SS,STUDY ST, study_event SE,dn_item_data_map didm, discrepancy_note dn where SS.study_id = ST.study_id AND ss.study_subject_id = se.study_subject_id AND (ST.study_id=? or ST.parent_study_id= ?) AND didm.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id AND didm.discrepancy_note_id = dn.discrepancy_note_id

query.name: getGroupByStudySubject
query.sql: SELECT sg.* from study_group sg, study_subject ss, subject_group_map sgm where sgm.study_group_id = sg.study_group_id and sgm.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id and ss.study_subject_id = ? and (ss.study_id = ? or study_id in (select study_id from study where parent_study_id = ?))

query.name: getCountWithFilterAuditLog
query.sql: SELECT COUNT( DISTINCT SS.study_subject_id) FROM study_subject ss LEFT JOIN study_event se ON ss.study_subject_id = se.study_subject_id,STUDY ST,SUBJECT S,USER_ACCOUNT UA where SS.SUBJECT_ID=S.SUBJECT_ID AND SS.study_id = ST.study_id AND SS.owner_id = UA.user_id AND (ST.study_id=? or ST.parent_study_id=?)

query.name: getWithFilterAndSortAuditLog
query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT(ss.*), s.date_of_birth,s.unique_identifier, ua.user_name FROM study_subject ss LEFT JOIN study_event se ON ss.study_subject_id = se.study_subject_id,STUDY ST,SUBJECT S,USER_ACCOUNT UA where SS.SUBJECT_ID=S.SUBJECT_ID AND SS.study_id = ST.study_id AND SS.owner_id = UA.user_id AND (ST.study_id=? or ST.parent_study_id=?)

query.name: findAll
query.sql: SELECT * FROM study_subject

query.name: findAllBySitetId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM study_subject where study_id=?

query.name: findAnotherBySameLabel
query.sql: SELECT ss.* FROM study_subject ss, study st WHERE ss.label=? AND ss.study_id=st.study_id AND st.study_id=? AND ss.study_subject_id != ?

query.name: findAnotherBySameLabelInSites
query.sql: SELECT ss.* FROM study_subject ss, study st WHERE ss.label=? AND ss.study_id=st.study_id AND st.parent_study_id=? AND ss.study_subject_id != ?

query.name: findByLabelAndStudy
query.sql: SELECT ss.* FROM study_subject ss, study st WHERE ss.label=? AND ss.study_id=st.study_id AND (st.study_id=? or st.parent_study_id=?)

query.name: findByLabel
query.sql: SELECT ss.* FROM study_subject ss WHERE ss.label=?

query.name: findSameByLabelAndStudy
query.sql: SELECT ss.* FROM study_subject ss, study st WHERE ss.label=? AND ss.study_id=st.study_id AND (st.study_id=? or st.parent_study_id=?) AND ss.study_subject_id != ?

query.name: findAllByStudy
query.sql: SELECT ss.* FROM study_subject ss, study st WHERE ss.study_id = st.study_id AND (st.study_id=? or st.parent_study_id=?)

query.name: findAllByStudySDV
query.sql: SELECT mss.* FROM study_subject mss, study mst WHERE mss.study_id = mst.study_id AND (mst.study_id=? or mst.parent_study_id=?)

query.name: countAllByStudySDV
query.sql: SELECT COUNT( mss.study_subject_id) FROM study_subject mss, study mst WHERE mss.study_id = mst.study_id AND (mst.study_id=? or mst.parent_study_id=?)

query.name: findAllByStudyId
query.sql: SELECT s.unique_identifier, s.gender, ss.*, stu.name FROM subject s, study_subject ss, study stu WHERE s.subject_id = ss.subject_id AND ss.study_id = stu.study_id AND (stu.study_id=? or stu.parent_study_id=?) AND s.status_id=1 order by ss.date_updated desc

query.name: findAllByStudyIdAndLimit
query.sql: SELECT s.unique_identifier, s.gender, ss.*, stu.name FROM subject s, study_subject ss, study stu WHERE s.subject_id = ss.subject_id AND ss.study_id = stu.study_id AND (stu.study_id=? or stu.parent_study_id=?) AND s.status_id=1 order by ss.date_updated desc limit 5

query.name: create
query.sql: INSERT INTO study_subject (LABEL, SUBJECT_ID, STUDY_ID, STATUS_ID, DATE_CREATED, OWNER_ID, ENROLLMENT_DATE, SECONDARY_LABEL, OC_OID) VALUES (?,?,?,?,now(),?,?,?,?)

query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE study_subject SET LABEL=?, SUBJECT_ID=?, STUDY_ID=?, STATUS_ID=?, ENROLLMENT_DATE=?, DATE_UPDATED=now(), UPDATE_ID=?, SECONDARY_LABEL=?, TIME_ZONE=? , USER_UUID=? WHERE STUDY_SUBJECT_ID=?

query.name: getCurrentPK
query.sql: SELECT currval('study_subject_study_subject_id_seq') AS key

query.name: findAllWithStudyEvent
query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT S.* FROM study_subject S , study_event E , study st WHERE S.study_subject_id = E.study_subject_id AND S.study_id=st.study_id AND (st.study_id=? or st.parent_study_id=?)

query.name: findBySubjectIdAndStudy
query.sql: SELECT ss.*, st.unique_identifier FROM study_subject ss, study st WHERE ss.subject_id=? AND ss.study_id=st.study_id AND (st.study_id=? or st.parent_study_id=?)

query.name: findAllBySubjectId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM study_subject WHERE subject_id=?

query.name: findAllByStudyOrderByLabel
query.sql: SELECT ss.* FROM study_subject ss, study st WHERE ss.study_id = st.study_id AND (st.study_id=? or st.parent_study_id=?) ORDER BY ss.label ASC

query.name: findAllActiveByStudyOrderByLabel
query.sql: SELECT ss.* FROM study_subject ss, study st WHERE ss.study_id = st.study_id AND (st.study_id=? or st.parent_study_id=?) AND (ss.status_id=1 or ss.status_id=8) ORDER BY ss.label ASC

query.name: getTotalCountStudySubjectForCrfMigration
query.sql: select count(Distinct ec.study_subject_id) from event_crf ec JOIN study_subject ss on ss.study_subject_id = ec.study_subject_id JOIN study_event se on se.study_event_id = ec.study_event_id JOIN form_layout fl on fl.form_layout_id = ec.form_layout_id JOIN study_event_definition sed on sed.study_event_definition_id= se.study_event_definition_id JOIN study s on s.study_id=ss.study_id LEFT JOIN event_definition_crf edc on (edc.crf_id = fl.crf_id and edc.study_id = ss.study_id and edc.study_event_definition_id= se.study_event_definition_id) where ec.form_layout_id=? and (sed.oc_oid = ANY(string_to_array(?,','))) and (s.oc_oid = ANY(string_to_array(?,','))) and (edc.selected_version_ids isNull or edc.selected_version_ids='' or (? = ANY (string_to_array(selected_version_ids,',')) and ? = ANY (string_to_array(selected_version_ids,',')) ) )

query.name: getTotalEventCrfCountForCrfMigration
query.sql: select count(*) from event_crf ec JOIN study_subject ss on ss.study_subject_id = ec.study_subject_id JOIN study_event se on se.study_event_id = ec.study_event_id JOIN form_layout fl on fl.form_layout_id = ec.form_layout_id JOIN study_event_definition sed on sed.study_event_definition_id= se.study_event_definition_id JOIN study s on s.study_id=ss.study_id LEFT JOIN event_definition_crf edc on (edc.crf_id = fl.crf_id and edc.study_id = ss.study_id and edc.study_event_definition_id= se.study_event_definition_id) where ec.form_layout_id=? and (sed.oc_oid = ANY(string_to_array(?,','))) and (s.oc_oid = ANY(string_to_array(?,','))) and (edc.selected_version_ids isNull or edc.selected_version_ids='' or (? = ANY (string_to_array(selected_version_ids,',')) and ? = ANY (string_to_array(selected_version_ids,',')) ) )
